oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Abernathy, Laban, 1833 July 02
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Laban Abernathy, dated July 2nd, 1833. Illustrates the first page of the document. The notation reads “recorded in book No. 10, pages 183 and 184 of examined,” in Davidson County Probate. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Abernathy family
